title: FS: T205 Wallace (One Line and Two Lines of 1910 Stats)
author: asoriano

posts.post_title: FS: T205 Wallace (One Line and Two Lines of 1910 Stats)
posts.post_content:
Tough cards to find in high grade.

$4,000 for the pair:

[URL="http://img141.imageshack.us/i/wallacej.jpg/"][IMG]http://img141.imageshack.us/img141/2646/wallacej.jpg[/IMG][/URL]

[URL="http://img199.imageshack.us/i/wallace2m.jpg/"][IMG]http://img199.imageshack.us/img199/4963/wallace2m.jpg[/IMG][/URL]


Cashier's Check or Money Order only, please.
$4,000 for the pair; will also split the cards up if anyone is interested in that route.

Wallace One Line: $2,500

Wallace Two Lines: On Hold
